reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Freising is a great little town outside of Munich and Corbin was a good deal compared with some of the other hotels in or around Munich. Close to the train station, so getting into Munich was not a problem. The hotel is well maintained and has a unique design with asian influence. The breakfast spread was great. If you can afford a 45 minute or so train ride into Munich, this hotel is woth it.
reviews.title: Very Clean and Unique Design

reviews.text: Stayed here for one night on my way back to the US from Spain. It's an ideal hotel for a stopover. Close to the airport (10 mins) with nice rooms, excellent staff and a good breakfast. The town is also worth checking out and there are some good local restaurants well within walking distance. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Great Option for Munich Airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Corbin, Fueng Shui business Hotel is a real find. Most of the airport hotels in Munchen are adequate at best. This hotel is in Friesen and is only about 10 minutes from the airport. While the rooms are small they are smartly organized. They are ultra modern, super clean, very reasonable and the windows open! The breakfast is better than average, too.
reviews.title: Great Little Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We enjoyed our stay of 2 days and were especially pleased with: Yvonne, Teresa, Tina and Elizabeth. Keep up the good work.
reviews.title: Great Staff!!!

reviews.text: Walk to the Old Town. Very good breakfast. Clean and well run Hotel!
reviews.title: Quiet, comfy hotel, well placed for the airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: right next to downtown, underground parking, fantastic breakfasts included. The beer and Coke in the fridge is free! Bikes available for excursions. Advertised as Feng-Shui, I would call it Euro-contemporary. Unbelievably friendly, helpful staff. great rates too.
reviews.title: What a find
great room, great service, great atmosphere

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Fine feng shui

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very good sleep in quiet location
reviews.title: Bavarian Gem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Me and my boyfriend booked a room at the corbin hotel and the service, and stay was relaxing and hassel free..Definetly going back to the corbin in november :) ....If your looking for comfort and relaxation this is the hotel for you!!!! Definetly not to far from the airport and the front desk is great :)
reviews.title: Better Than the marriott !!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I've always stayed at the Kempinski for convenience, but this was a pleasant change. I must say that the service was terrific. Relaxing, close to the airport, yet also near a few fun things to do including a great outdoor dinner/beer at the Weihenstephan. I will return and save some $$$ over the Kempinski.
reviews.title: A breath of fresh air....

likes.disliked: — No faults I can think of (Really!)

reviews.text: I've stayed in the Corbin many times over the past few years and I've never been disappointed. My company has a large facility in Freising. Although the Corbin is on the preferred hotel list, almost everyone, not just the Americans, choose the large chain hotel around the corner. I tried it once and I was disappointed by contrast. I find the Corbin to be always clean and well-maintained. The simplicity of the furniture, the decor, and the design must be part of the Feng Shui influence and I do find the whole package tranquil and relaxing. The staff remembers me from time to time and I get the sense that they are genuinely pleased to see and serve me. The breakfast is great. There is no dinner or lunch service, but I've had some great meals in the hotel lobby or dining room that the staff has ordered in for me. They also provide bar service in the lobby and good advice on places to go. Finally, I always pay the same corporate rate, even during high season, such as Oktoberfest. The other hotel doubles or triples the rate during high season on all but a limited block of rooms. This is my home away from home in Freising.
reviews.title: Always a Pleasure
where service is still alive
reviews.text: i´ve been there a few times now and i have to say that their kind of service is very unusualy in these days.
